result.title: Process conditions affect properties and outcomes of polyhydroxyalkanoate accumulation in municipal activated sludge

details.authors: The developments of mixed culture polyhydroxyalkanoate production has been directed to maximize the biomass PHA content with limited attention to polymer quality. Direct comparison of PHA accumulation literature is challenging, and even regularly contradicting in reported results, due to underlying differences that are not well expressed. A study was undertaken to systematically compare the common
